content: आशिस् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} (°शीः, °शीर्भ्यां &c.) [ आशास्-क्विप्, अत इत्वम्] {@--1@} A blessing, benediction. (It is thus defined: --वात्सल्याद्यत्र मान्येन कनिष्ठस्याभिधीयते . इष्टावधारकं वाक्यमाशीः सा परिकीतिंता ..). आशिस् is sometimes distinguished from वर, the former being taken to be merely an expression of one's good wishes which may or may not be realized; while a वर is a boon which is more permanent in character and surer of fulfilment; <ab>cf.</ab> वरः खल्वेषनाशीः <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; आशिषो गुरुजनवितीर्णा वरतामापद्यंते <ls>K. 291</ls>; अमोघाः प्रतिगृह्णंतावर्घ्यानुपदमाशिषः <ls>R. 1. 44</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 6</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 76</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">7. 47.</ls> {@--2@} Act of bestowing a blessing upon others. {@--3@} A prayer, wish, desire; <ls>Ku. 5. 76</ls>, <ls>Bg. 4. 21</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">6. 10.</ls> {@--4@} A serpent's fang (<ab>cf.</ab> आशी). {@--5@} One of the eight chief medicaments (वृद्धि).
